item.title: CVE-2024-30218|2024-04-09T01:04:40.206Z -- SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP and ABAP Platform
item.description: The ABAP Application Server of SAP NetWeaver as well as ABAP PlatformÂ allows an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service. This leads to a considerable impact on availability.
